column4: Hey can someone bail me out? I did a fresh install of Gutsy and got all the custom visual effects working but then I did the updates and that broke something. I now can'
updates?
Yes, sorry. The updates broke something. I noticed one of them was compiz after I started the process
It's possible one of the newer updates messed your video cards settings....
Everything looks OK still. Anything in particular to check?
Well, what, itsn't working?
I had all the custom visual effects working but the update broke that. I've been reset to None in Appearances. If I try to enable I get "Desktop effects could not be enabled"
What kind of video card?
ATI Radeon X1150.
xgl installed?
no xgl. I had too many problems with that on another laptop. Literally a clean install of Gutsy followed by ATI (via Envy f it matters)
Use restricted drivers manager...do reconfigure if you have to...envy causes problems
I was afraid you'd say that. OK.
Envy not supported or recommended around here. This is exactly why.
Is a direct install from ATI's downloaded driver worse?
Use the restricted drivers manager, that's why it's there
My understanding is that the restricted driver is old, doesn't support AIGLX and generally doesn't handle compiz 3d effects as well
That might be....#compiz-fusion is the best place to ask about that, but definitely don't use envy.....And the RESTRICTED DRIVER manager, is not inherently the same as the driver itself.
Sorry can you clarify the difference between the restricted driver manager and the driver itself for me please?
As I understand it, the manager isn't tied to those drivers
And I could be wrong, it'd be the 3rd time in 2 days I was wrong....Ask in #compiz-fusion to make sure you get it tip-top
Thanks for the help. As I said to crdlb I'm off to reboot
